attributes.action: aneroxia is an invisible  mental illness that should be recognised and treated,taken seriously as much as a physical illness
attributes.additional_details: aneroxia is an invisible  mental illness that should be recognised and treated,taken seriously as much as a physical illness.this epetition is put in place as i think people should take it more seriously and have a better understanding knowledge of this illness as it can not just  effect the individual but all people around them and it can be a very complexed illness to understand so there needs to be more talk on mental health and knowledge of it to prevent ed and suicide.
